results.name: Composite numbers k+1 such that A002322(A027760(k)) = k.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: 1 + Select[Range[500], CompositeQ[# + 1] && CarmichaelLambda[ Times @@ Select[1 + Divisors@ #, PrimeQ]] == # &] (* _Giovanni Resta_, Aug 13 2018 *)
results.author: _Max Alekseyev_ and _Thomas Ordowski_, Jul 09 2018
